title: Gold Notebook with front pocket (A6) Journal - Bookaroo
description:
There are pocket notebooks and then there's a Bookaroo 'pocket' notebook! We know that big ideas often come from small things so this little notebook has all the paper quality and really useful features of the A5 version, like contents pages, numerable pages and tear-outable perforated sheets at the back for lists and note leaving, BUT at a fraction of the size.
Oh and this time we have added a beautifully stitched front pocket for those annoying little loose bits of paper that are so easy to lose and yet such a nightmare if you do! Pop in a train ticket, cash, card, receipt or business card! A really nice thing to drop in your pocket or handbag for moments of inspiration, studies, shopping, work or college stuff. Mix and match with Bookaroo A5 notebooks.
With unique stitched front ‘pocket'
Hard back with soft faux-leather PU cover
A6: 9.50 x 15.50 cm (3.8 x 6.1 in)
192 pages of heavier quality lined paper
Eight perforated tear out and keep pages
Coordinated ribbon and elasticated strap

title: Black faux leather Glasses Case with flexible elastic
description:
Never lose your glasses with this great glasses case, made of superior quality leather effect PU. It fits A5 style notebooks and novels-size books too!
Reading glasses HAVE to be one of the most misplaced items the world over! But slide the flexible elastic over your notebook, journal or novel cover, slide your specs into the velour lined pouch and tah dah! They’ll be right there when you need them next! One of the most useful gifts you can give!

title: فارس - يوميَّات رمضانيَّة
description:
This booklet is an excellent initiative, in which your child can have his little religious program for each day of the month of Ramadan.
For each day, there is a verse with an explanation, a hadith, a checklist of prayers, readings of the Koran etc... to do, a question to know more about a Sahaba, a good deed to do.
Visually engaging and suitable for children from about 8 to 12 years old, it is an opportunity to increase their faith during this blessed period and to devote part of their day to discovering and practicing their religion.

title: واعد - يوميَّات رمضانيَّة
description:
This booklet is an excellent initiative, in which your child can have his little religious program for each day of the month of Ramadan.
For each day, there is a verse and a hadith, a question to learn more about a Sahaba, a good deed to do.
Visually engaging and suitable for children from about 12 to 16 years old, it is an opportunity to increase their faith during this blessed period and to devote part of their day to discovering and practicing their religion.

title: شرح عقيدة مالك الصغير ابن أبي زيد القيرواني
author: القاضي عبد الوهاب بن نصر البغدادي
description:
This book is one of the most important commentaries on the Introduction of Ibn Abî Zayd al-Qayrawânî al Maliki (386 AH) and a great enlightenment; indeed, its authors were among the greatest Maliki scholars. The first is Ibn Abi Zaid, whose name is Malik as-Saghir, the author of the Matn ; and the second is Abu Muhammad Abd al-Wahhab al-Baghdadi al-Maliki, a great scholar and one of the most prominent Maliki jurists of his time (422H).
This valuable book is offered to you by the Muhammadiyah Association of Scholars in Morocco, with Tahqiq of the text and footnotes on selected points and on the Hadiths.

title: Blush Notebook with front pocket (A6) Journal - Bookaroo
description:
There are pocket notebooks and then there's a Bookaroo 'pocket' notebook! We know that big ideas often come from small things so this little notebook has all the paper quality and really useful features of the A5 version, like contents pages, numerable pages and tear-outable perforated sheets at the back for lists and note leaving, BUT at a fraction of the size.
Oh and this time we have added a beautifully stitched front pocket for those annoying little loose bits of paper that are so easy to lose and yet such a nightmare if you do! Pop in a train ticket, cash, card, receipt or business card! A really nice thing to drop in your pocket or handbag for moments of inspiration, studies, shopping, work or college stuff. Mix and match with Bookaroo A5 notebooks.
With unique stitched front ‘pocket'
Hard back with soft faux-leather PU cover
A6: 9.50 x 15.50 cm (3.8 x 6.1 in)
192 pages of heavier quality lined paper
Eight perforated tear out and keep pages
Coordinated ribbon and elasticated strap

A better class of bookmark, created from some gorgeous and colourful patterns from the Victoria & Albert museum’s holdings of textile and wallpaper design. They have then been carefully printed onto superior quality faux leather, embellished with metal eyelets and gold grosgrain ribbon and finished with debossed detailing on the reverse.

Perfect small glass hanger, made with superior quality leather effect PU. It uses strong magnets to attach to your book and it's stitched with debossed detailing. Fits both paperbacks and hardbacks.
Snap this little magnetic Bookaroo Glasses Hanger over the front cover of your book, slide the arm of your specs through the pocket and tah dah! They’ll be right there when you need them!

title: مسند الحميدي
author: الإمام الحميدي
description:
Among the important Masaaneed, there is “Musnad Al-Humaydi”, the Sheikh of Imam Al-Bukhari. He began his Musnad with the collection of Hadiths reported by the Ten Companions who were promised Paradise, then Al-Muhajirun (the Immigrants) and then Al-Ansar (the Supporters) men and women.
The collection contained some 1300 Hadiths. He concluded his Musnad with a statement explaining his creed (Usul as-Sunnah).
Superb edition from the very serious Saudi publisher, Dar at-Taaseel. Merkez researchers have checked the work from 4 manuscripts while correcting errors in existing old editions.Finally there are annotations on difficult words, with detailed research summaries (by verses, by Hadiths and Athar, by narrators), 100% Harakat.

title: ديوان وضاح اليمن
description:
Waddah al-Yaman is one of the finest Ummayyad poets and what makes his poetry distinct is its mirthful and irreverent wit. Waddah is now regarded as the national poet of Yemen.
All harakats on the poems and annotations explaining terms and difficult phrases.
Published by Dar Sader, a very serious publishing house, especially known for its work on the Arabic classics and the Diwans.

title: مجموع السلم المرونق في فن المنطق
description:
As-Sullam Al-Murawnaq Fi 'ilm Al-Mantiq (The Ornamented Ladder into the Science of Logic) is a highly popular didactic poem of 144 lines composed by Imam Abd al-Rahman al-Akhdari and is for beginners in the art of formal logic. This didactic poem is considered by many as a versification for the book of Isaghuji, it covers the principles of Aristotelian logic and its utility in support of Islamic Creed and Jurisprudence.
It is well known to the scholars, who have thoroughly studied and commented upon it. Indeed, many annotations were written about it and the scholars recommended that it should be studied and taught.
This collection gathered 7 among the most popular explanation of this poem: Ad-Damanhuri, Al-Walali, Al-Quwaysini, Ad-Darwi, al-Akhdari himself, al-Qaddurah, As-Sajilmasi.
Really beautiful and serious edition, with some of the Harakat, useful annotations, diagrams and tables.

An ideal companion for travellers and a really useful tool for beginners and students with this useful basic dictionary.
Great for basic translation
Thousands of word definition data
Easy to use and ideal for travel
Works offline!
Comes with replaceable battery fitted
